attributes.action: call to have david lammy mp for tottenham   ,,, to be sacked
attributes.background: david lammy mp for tottenham ,,  has  asked for our voting system to be ignored ,,,,,,,,,,,, we the people ask for his resignation or his dismissal ,, as he has shown contempt for the voting process....by calling for mp's to ignore the peoples decision he has shown he is not fit to be an mp

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
